description: Test performance thresholds for YC-style fast feedback loops

notes.totalDuration: Maximum total test suite duration in ms (60s limit, 30s target)
notes.p95: Maximum p95 test duration in ms (200ms limit, 100ms target)
notes.setupTime: Maximum setup time in ms (15s limit, 5s target)
notes.individualTest: Maximum individual test duration in ms
notes.slowTestCount: Maximum number of tests exceeding individualTest threshold
